Replies.Author: Daniel Pascua
Replies.Content: Well I’m sure you know the references better than me Gene. But hey, Comiket looks cool, and I think I’d like to go there someday.

Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content:
Kuroneko is the best cha–

I mean, Comiket looks really cool. I’d like to visit one day. And hey, another good post. I’m liking these.. they make me feel better for liking the show.

Looking forward to that which will accompany today’s showing!
